subject: Cannot login to account
description: I have been unable to login to my account since yesterday morning. Password reset does not work either.

subject: Double charged for subscription
description: My credit card was charged twice for the monthly subscription renewal on January 15th.

subject: App crashes on startup
description: The application crashes immediately after opening on my Android phone with a white screen error.

subject: Feature request for dark mode
description: It would be great if you could add a dark mode option to the settings page for better nighttime usage.

subject: Unexpected behavior in search
description: The search function returns unexpected results when using special characters. Steps to reproduce: type @# in search.

subject: Two-factor authentication not working
description: I enabled 2FA on my account but the verification codes are not being sent to my phone.

subject: Request refund for last payment
description: I would like to request a refund for my last payment as the service was down for three days.

subject: Server error 500 on dashboard
description: Getting a 500 server error every time I try to access the analytics dashboard page.

subject: Add export to PDF feature
description: Please add the ability to export reports to PDF format. This would be a nice enhancement.

subject: Regression in file upload
description: File upload was working last week but now consistently fails with large files. This is a regression.

subject: Account locked after password change
description: My account got locked immediately after I changed my password. Cannot access any features.

subject: Invoice not showing correct amount
description: The invoice for February shows an incorrect amount that does not match my subscription plan.

subject: Page loads very slowly
description: The main dashboard page takes over 30 seconds to load. Everything is very slow and unresponsive.

subject: Suggestion for mobile notifications
description: I wish the app would support push notifications on mobile devices for important updates.

subject: Stack trace in payment module
description: Encountered a stack trace error in the payment processing module during checkout consistently.

subject: Cannot access shared documents
description: I cannot access the shared documents folder. I get an access denied error every time.

subject: Cancel subscription request
description: I need to cancel my subscription and get a prorated refund for the remaining billing period.

subject: Application freeze during save
description: The application freezes completely when trying to save large documents. Have to force quit.

subject: Could you add bulk import feature
description: Could you add the ability to bulk import data from spreadsheets? This would improve workflow.

subject: Intermittent failure in notifications
description: The notification system has intermittent failures where alerts are not delivered to users.

subject: Sign in page broken on Safari
description: The sign in page does not render correctly on Safari browser. Login button is not clickable.

subject: Upgrade plan pricing question
description: I want to understand the pricing difference between the basic and premium plans before upgrading.

subject: Error when generating reports
description: Getting an error exception when trying to generate monthly reports from the analytics section.

subject: New feature for team collaboration
description: I would like to request a new feature for real-time team collaboration on shared documents.

subject: Defect in user profile page
description: There is a defect on the user profile page where the avatar image does not save properly.

subject: Reset password link expired
description: The reset password link I received expires before I can use it. The link is only valid for 5 minutes.

subject: Receipt not received for purchase
description: I made a purchase three days ago but never received the email receipt for my records.

subject: Blank page after login
description: After successfully logging in I see a blank page instead of the dashboard. Nothing loads.

subject: Please add API rate limit dashboard
description: Please add a dashboard to monitor API rate limits and usage statistics in real time.

subject: Steps to reproduce payment bug
description: I can reproduce a bug in the payment flow. Steps: add item to cart then change quantity to zero.

subject: MFA setup fails on mobile
description: Multi-factor authentication setup fails when scanning the QR code on mobile devices.

subject: Downgrade subscription plan
description: I want to downgrade my subscription from premium to basic plan starting next billing cycle.

subject: Timeout on file download
description: File downloads consistently timeout when the file size exceeds 100MB. Server times out.

subject: Enhancement for search filters
description: I suggest improving the search functionality with advanced filter options for better results.

subject: Consistently fails on export
description: The CSV export function consistently fails when there are more than 1000 records in the dataset.

subject: Locked out of admin panel
description: I am locked out of the admin panel after entering the wrong password three times.

subject: Credit card update failing
description: I cannot update my credit card information. The payment form shows an error on submit.

subject: Glitch in notification settings
description: There is a glitch in the notification settings where toggles revert after saving preferences.

subject: Would be nice to have templates
description: It would be nice to have email templates that can be customized for automated responses.

subject: Unexpected behavior in calendar
description: The calendar widget shows unexpected behavior when switching between months with different day counts.

subject: Authentication error on API
description: Getting an authentication error when making API calls with a valid token. Access is denied.

subject: Overcharged on annual plan
description: I was overcharged on my annual subscription renewal. The amount is higher than the listed price.

subject: Application not working on iOS
description: The application is not working properly on iOS devices. Buttons are unresponsive and screens lag.

subject: Request for webhook support
description: I would like to request webhook support for real-time event notifications in the platform.

subject: Repro steps for sync bug
description: Here are the repro steps for the data sync bug: create record offline then connect to internet.

subject: Cannot sign in after update
description: After the latest app update I cannot sign in anymore. The signin page just spins endlessly.

subject: Payment failed but amount deducted
description: My payment failed according to the system but the amount was deducted from my bank account.

subject: 404 error on help page
description: The help center page returns a 404 error when clicking on any article link from the sidebar.

subject: Add support for CSV import
description: Please add support for importing data from CSV files directly into the application dashboard.

subject: Data loss after system crash
description: I experienced data loss after a system crash. My recent changes from the past hour are all gone.
